name: get_quotes_by_anime_title
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool anime_quotes_v4.
Tool description: An API for serving high-quality anime quotes
API description: Fetches quotes from a specified anime title using the Anime Quotes API.

title.description: The title of the anime for which to fetch quotes. Defaults to 'Fairy Tail'.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to '1'.
